title: Find optimal tokens 3x faster, pay with memory.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `95.02%`
> Merging **#71** into **master** will increase coverage by **+0.06%** as of [`f1cb102`][3]


```diff
@@            master     #71   diff @@
======================================
  Files           14      14       
  Stmts          715     723     +8
  Branches        86      87     +1
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            679     687     +8
  Partial          0       0       
  Missed          36      36       
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`f1cb102`][3]


-----
### [Uncovered Suggestions][2]

1. `+0.69%` via [...internal/Split.scala#79...83](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Split.scala?ref=f1cb1021b09393173355a407b61656d54ffa8060#79) 
1. `+0.27%` via [...lafmt/ScalaFmt.scala#47...48](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/ScalaFmt.scala?ref=f1cb1021b09393173355a407b61656d54ffa8060#47) 
1. `+0.27%` via [...l/Modification.scala#45...46](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Modification.scala?ref=f1cb1021b09393173355a407b61656d54ffa8060#45) 
1. *[See 7 more...][2]*

body:
